paragraph1: MIDFORM ® is one of the leading international companies specialized in the manufacturing of stylish and comfortable furniture for your living room. Our company is strongly committed to the development of unique design furniture that will take your living experience to a different level.
paragraph2: Choosing MIDFORM® means choosing premium quality design at an affordable price, made possible by the streamlined production processes which take place in factories in Europe.
paragraph3: The company offers chairs, sofas, tables, stools, bended plywood, boxes and more across multiple price brands, creating a variety of solutions in terms of style and budget.
item1_text: The experienced hands of our craftsmen make every detail of the designs possible, producing items destined to transform spaces through beauty.
item2_text: We offer a wide range of different materials, sourced from renowned suppliers. Our use of extraordinary materials is part of our recognizable style and has become an important element of our “signature“.
item3_text: Our furniture collections are offered trough ourdifferent brands. We monitor, follow and set the worldwide trends as one thing remains key for our entire collection: an uncompareable uniquedesign of our masterpieces.
